record.creatorPhotographer: Martyn, Edward W.; Martyn's Maroon Studio
record.description: University of Chicago Football Team, 1918, Student's Army Training Corps. Sixth row: A. A. Stagg (coach); fifth row: H. O. Page (assistant coach), W. Stegeman, D. D. Gray, A. B. Sears, R. L. Miller, D. Teas, and T. Eck (trainer); fourth row: C. E. J. Fouche, J. Harris, C. E. McGuire, M. W. Swenson, and J. C. Reber; third row: A. Witzleben, R. T. Halladay, R .K. Newhall, and M. C. McQuaig; second row: D. Eubank, J. E. Tays, F. M. Elton (captain), V. L. Smith, and J. P. Neff; first row: J. J. Schwab, D. P. Bradley, R. N. Hermes, and H. P. McComb. Men awarded the C: Captain R. H. Elton, L. E. Bradley, L. T. Stegeman, R. E. Holladay, R. T. McGuire, F. B. Hermes, and J. C. Reber.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
